channel.title: How can i make it where my server retarts every 20 mins
channel.description: i already have the server auto restarter in my folder and know how to set my anti lag but how can i get it to close the runserver.bat thing wen its been 20 mins so they restarter knows to restart a new one please tell thanks =] ?
